title: Troty_Energy_Research_Facility_Wiki
content: Troty Energy Research Facility, shortened as T.E.R.F, is a test world for a vanilla Minecraft technology datapack created by jona23E. This datapack adds various multiblock machines that enable mass-material manufacturing and processing.

title: WarpCore
content: WarpCore is a device capable of teleporting almost everything across many dimensions. Consumes 10000 MWt per one block in action area. It is inspired by "The Spire" from Portal: Revolution. The main challenge of building a WarpCore is getting 32 netherite blocks. Everything else is obtainable from the storage. Components: Netherite: 32 Blocks (see Netherite Refining Process), Copper Coils, Ancient Debris, High Voltage Conductor Slabs, High Voltage Conductor Walls, Iron Bars, Decorated pots. Guides: FJSAGS and Cookies. WarpCore Statuses: Jfrnrn's warp kis: boom boomed; Warpinuss: working with jongara; chicas warp core: stolen by corkstud; Cooockis WarpCore: in possession of Jongara; Ragn4Rockxs Raging Rock's WarpCore(s): destroyed by ART shot; Ronans WarpCore: unknown; WarpCore Neotheater: destroyed, failure after meteorite hit; WarpCore OK Orchestra (3rd edition): destroyed by ART shot; Corrstud's WarpCore Quasar Outpost: in stasis; WarpCore Aurora: adidas.

title: Hadron_Collider
content: The Hadron Collider is a machine in the TERF Facility, used to smash items into other items at high speeds to create new items. It is a major part of the Netherite Refining Process. Technicals: Multiblock Core Placement: Into the Interface Cauldron facing forwards; Power Input: Into the Interface; Power Consumption(MW): ${ Length\times 16}. Build Tutorial: Interface, Rings (min. 128 copper/tinted glass rings), Terminal. Recipes: multiple, e.g., 1x Slime Block + 12x Coal -> 2x Diamond, 2x Diamond + 16x Redstone -> 1x Netherite Scrap, etc. Special Recipes: Nether Star + 7x Netherite Scrap -> Netherite Upgrade Template; Red Bed + 4x Ancient Debris -> Placed Bedrock causing temporary gravitational anomaly.

title: Wet_Mill
content: This machine pulverizes fine crushed materials into very fine dust. Multiblock Core Placement: Into the pot; Power Input: In the Conductor Block; Power Consumption: 6MW during operation. Fluid Extraction: via copper pipes below the decorated pot; Cauldrons must be full of water. Recipe examples: Gold Dust -> Gold Slurry; more recipes coming.

title: Electrolyzer
content: Used to convert water (H2O) into oxygen (O) and hydrogen (H). Multiblock Core Placement: See build tutorial; Power Input: Conductor Block; Power Consumption: 16MW. Recipe: Water 30mb -> Hydrogen 20mb + Oxygen 10mb (100 ticks).

title: Large_Fluid_Solidifier
content: Converts liquids into blocks. Located at the topside of TERF. Common use: mineral magma into ores.

title: Music_and_credits
content: Up-to-date music list for TERF map. Upper Facility: Startup Failure (Uproar mashup, Halloween Theme), Overload (Panic Track, Roller Mobster), Freezedown (Malware Injection), Startup (Reconstructing More Science Remix), Successful Restabilization (Battle), OpenCore (Ordinary music, Rare music), Warhead (Sabotage), Self Destruction Sequence (Final Flash of Existence). title: Fabricator
content: Fabricates custom items and tools. Multiblock Core Placement: Into the crafter; Power Input: Behind the crafter; Power Consumption: 100MW. Recipe instructions: Insert required items into crafter and press the button.

title: Netherite_Refining_Process
content: Step-by-step process to make netherite using TERF machines. Initial resources: Honeycomb, Coal/Charcoal, Redstone. Steps include: crafting Honeycomb Blocks, pressing to Slime Balls, crafting Slime Blocks, optionally converting Charcoal to Coal, combining Slime Blocks and Coal into Diamonds, Diamonds and Redstone into Netherite Scrap, and finally processing Netherite Scrap into Netherite Ingots via OpenCore.

title: The_S.T.F.R
content: Fusion reactor at TERF. Structure: 6 stabilisers, encasing superstructure, main core. Core: shield layer + internal deuterium-deuterium fusion core. Case: transfers heat to turbines for power. Stabilisers: maintain core stability. Breakers: supply DC current during startup/restabilisation. Coolant Pump: circulates coolant. Control Panel: operates S.T.F.R. Mainframe: connects machines and security. Turbines/Generator: steam production for power generation.

title: The_D.E.M
content: Dark Energy Manipulator (D.E.M): black hole-based mass-to-energy conversion device. Structure: Core (black hole), Horizon Scrubber, Power Lasers, Power Extractors, Stabilizers, Startup Manifold. Operation Parameters: Global Laser Offset, Global Power Laser, EMRIR Shield Density, Horizon Scrubber Engage %, Field Compression Control, Electron Injection. Crucial Components: Control Panel, Mainframe. Trivia: Full name 'Superradiant Scattering Type Full Mass Conversion Electromagnetic Radiation Internally Reflecting Shield Dark Energy'.

title: Physical_Connections
content: Machines require physical connections: electrical, fluidic, or digital. Omnidirectional Connecting Blocks (input/output any side), Directed Connecting Blocks (input/output opposite sides). Types: Electrical Cables (power), Hot Fluid Pipe (steam, mineral magma), Cold Fluid Pipe (coolant), Data Connection (control panels and multiblocks via mainframe).

title: Arc_Furnace
content: Remelts whole blocks into different or purer materials. Multiblock Core Placement: Into copper block; Power Input: On top of coil; Power Consumption: 16MW. Recipes: e.g., Cobblestone -> Lava, Smooth Stone -> Deepslate, Raw Copper Block -> Copper Block, Raw Gold Block -> Gold Block, Raw Iron Block -> Iron Block.

title: Electric_Press
content: Presses items into other items. Multiblock Core Placement: Shown in Infobox; Power Input: Above top cut copper block; Power Consumption: 1500 MWt per operation; Activation: Power piston. Recipes: 1x Honeycomb -> 1x Slimeball, 1x Honeycomb Block -> 4x Slimeball, 8x String -> 1x Leather, 5x Blaze Powder -> 1x Blaze Rod, 1x Netherite Scrap -> 1x Ancient Debris.

title: OpenCore
content: Furnace using two positron emission units to remelt items 4x more efficiently. Multiblock Core Placement: Into iron blocks at bottom; Power Input: Into conductor blocks; Power Consumption: 1000mWh-10000mWh. Requires active M.C.F.R., C.R.R., S.T.F.R or D.E.M. Usage: temperature orders must be met; failure causes small/medium/large explosions depending on recipe complexity. Recipes: e.g., 8x Netherite Scrap -> 8x Netherite Ingot, 32x Glowstone Dust -> 24x Blaze Powder, 1x Netherite Block -> 1x Heavy Core.
